metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16042 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Uninitialized Use in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 87.0.4280.88 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information from process memory via a crafted HTML page.

notes.Note: amurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '84.0+build3-0ubuntu2').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
